stories.headline: Mapping a New Future for Reporting
stories.summary: George Landau discusses the benefits and uses of geographic information systems (GIS) in journalism, highlighting how they can transform raw census data into insightful stories by using thematic maps.

stories.headline: The Reel Inside Story: Some Tips on Tape
stories.summary: Jimmy Montague offers advice on choosing and maintaining quality computer tapes, addressing common issues like short tape lengths and data write skips, and discussing the impact of ANSI standards on tape quality.

stories.headline: Tax Problems in New York City, Again
stories.summary: Penny Loeb explores property tax issues in New York City, revealing inefficiencies and the disproportionate tax burden on poorer areas, supported by data analysis from computerized assessments.
